sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Sets the the default value of users to be disconnected to "Non-Resumable User" for each record in the sys_cs_live_agent_setup table.</description> <name>Set Users to be disconnected default val</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var liveAgentSetupGr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_live_agent_setup'); liveAgentSetupGr.query(); while (liveAgentSetupGr.next()) { if (!liveAgentSetupGr.getValue("users_to_be_disconnected")) { liveAgentSetupGr.setValue("users_to_be_disconnected", "non_resumable_guest"); liveAgentSetupGr.update(); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-17 00:14:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>97e142fe436121108aa06a6f5bb8f27f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Users to be disconnected default val</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Live Agent Conversation Settings" source="com.glide.cs.live_agent_settings">fd7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37fab</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_97e142fe436121108aa06a6f5bb8f27f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-17 17:55:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
